data.actual_result: Bob can still be searched and selected. On clicking "add members" Bob is not added, however. Nothing happens.
data.expected_result: Bob should not be found as he's no longer a friend of you. -
data.short_description: After being unfriended, user can still be selected to be added into a DM.
data.steps_to_repro: - Find your friend called Bob. - Open a group DM first or find an existing DM without Bob. - Ask Bob to unfriend you. - Type Bob's tag into DM invite box.
